mapper.select: SELECT * FROM OCRResult where id=#{id} order by id;
SELECT * FROM OCRResult where ocrTaskId=#{ocrTaskId} order by id;
SELECT * FROM OCRResult JOIN OCRTask ON OCRResult.ocrTaskId = OCRTask.id AND OCRTask.taskId = #{taskId} order by OCRResult.id

SELECT ocrResultId, TransTaskResult.id as transResultId, x,y, width, height, TransTaskResult.originalText as originalText, translatedText, translateFrom, translateTo FROM OCRResult JOIN OCRTask ON OCRResult.ocrTaskId = OCRTask.id AND OCRTask.taskId=#{taskId} JOIN TransTaskResult ON OCRResult.id = TransTaskResult.ocrResultId order by OCRResult.id
